metadata.description: Innocraft Systems plugin marketplace for Claude Code. Includes BMAD-Evals for automated sprint execution and agent evaluation.

plugins.name: bmad-evals
plugins.description: BMAD-Evals: Automated sprint execution with cross-context persistence. Run 100+ stories unattended with /sprint-run. Includes dependency-aware story chaining, RAG integration, TDD enforcement, and comprehensive dev permissions.
